info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:01AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Idaho and southwestern Ravalli Counties through 900 AM MDT/800 AM PDT/... At 800 AM MDT/700 AM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southwest of Conner, or 40 miles northwest of Salmon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Darby, Conner, Charlos Heights and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 16 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
